dataQuery.sqlStatement: select * from( (select 'drs_cutting' designation, 30 id from soft_salary) union (select 'drs_cutting' designation, 23 id from soft_salary) union (select 'drs_sth' designation, 22 id from soft_salary) union (select 'drs_sth' designation, 28 id from soft_salary) union (select 'drs_check' designation, 24 id from soft_salary)) where id =:slry_id
